alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 9:46PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and drifting snow will likely impact north to south roads. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... The worst travel conditions from snow and blowing snow will be early tonight through Saturday afternoon. A flash freeze is expected that will cause roads to become icy overnight.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this winter situation. If you must travel, take a winter emergency kit that includes blankets, a fully charged cell phone or cell phone charger, water, high energy snacks, a bag of sand or cat litter, a tow rope, a shovel, and a flashlight.
